 \item two types of inputs: \pause

  \end{itemize}
 \item two types of outputs: \pause
  \begin{itemize}
   \item regulated outputs: $z_1(t)$ and $z_2(t)$ to be beaten to zero\pause
   \item measured outputs: $y(t)$
  \end{itemize}
\end{itemize}

\pause
\begin{enumerate}
\item design usable controllers by minimizing the integral of some functions of the states and the inputs
\item minimization of an LQ integral cost can be reformulated as H2 system norm minization
\end{enumerate}
